constraints.name: partition_constraint
constraints.description: 将集合 {1, 2, ..., N} 划分为等价类 A1, A2, ..., AM，使得每个等价类内的元素满足保密性条件。
constraints.formal: Partition {1, 2, ..., N} into equivalence classes A1, A2, ..., AM such that for all i between 1 and M, the confidentiality condition is maintained.

constraints.name: confidentiality_condition
constraints.description: 对于每个等价类 Ai，必须满足保密性条件，即在 x 确定后，只能知道 x 所属的等价类 Ai 的索引 i，而不能精确知道 x 的值。
constraints.formal: For each equivalence class Ai, the condition must hold: .

constraints.name: maximize_single_element_classes
constraints.description: 在满足保密性条件的前提下，最大化只包含单个元素的等价类的数量。
constraints.formal: Maximize the number of equivalence classes that contain only a single element, subject to the confidentiality condition.
